name: Frontier of Fools
description:
One of my older projects, a 2d platformer heavily-heavily inspired by Hollow Knight. It didn't go anywhere, but I liked the art, and so I thought: might as well upload it.

CONTROLS:

  • [WASD] to move
  • [Space] to jump
  • [LMB] to hit
  • If you hold [W] when hitting, it will become upward strike
  • If you hold [S] when hitting midair, it will become downward strike. A little tricky, but gives you a lot of momentum.
